'''Bedrock Editor v0.7.6''' is a minor alpha release for the [[Bedrock Editor]] released on October 23, 2024.<ref>https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/204</ref><ref>https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/31291872110733-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-50-25</ref>

== Additions ==
;Locate tool
*Added a tool to allow player to find specific biomes within player's world and teleport to them easily. 
**This tool can be found under World Options -> Locate.

== Changes ==
*Time of day is fixed to noon at Editor startup.
*Improved viewport focus visibility with an animated outline on focus and added focused state as a step for toggle mode ({{keys|CTRL + TAB}}).
*Added {{cd|focusToolInputContext}} function to {{cd|ModalToolContainer}} which will try to set modal input focus (e.g. viewport for tool rail).
